contest-event.event-date:
May 20, 1907 D Howden-le-Wear Contest
Howden-le-Wear Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
howden-le-wear
Howden-le-Wear, County Durham 1st prize £8,2nd prize £5, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Willington, 2nd (10s.) Binchester and Whitworth. Part of Good Templars Gala. 4 bands competed
March 19, 2012, 5:28 p.m. Sept. 18, 2018, 8:28 a.m.
1 Brancepeth Welfare Band J. B. Wright
2 Cockfield J. Teasdale
3 Binchester and Whitworth R. Swinburn
4 Hunwick Silver J. B. Wright
